name: Touch Detective Rising 3
description: Touch Detective Rising 3: Does Funghi Dream of Bananas? (Japanese: おさわり探偵 小沢里奈 ライジング3 ~なめこはバナナの夢を見るか?~, Hepburn: Osawari Tantei Ozawa Rina Raijingu 3 ~Nameko wa Banana no Yume o Miru ka?~) is a point-and-click mystery adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS which makes use of the device's touch screen. It was developed by BeeWorks and released in Japan by Success Corporation. It is the third title in the Touch Detective (Osawari Tantei: Ozawa Rina) series, after Touch Detective and Touch Detective 2 ½. The features Mackenzie returning to the main character role as she faces a new detective rival, and once again takes her arch-rival, the Cornstalker.
